page.title: 07HARROD'S BUILDERS,NORTH KYME
page.content: The building firm was started by{Mr {Joseph Harrod}before 1895.It has been run by four generations of the family who have all been called Joseph. Harrods build bungalows and houses and do repair and maintenance work. Seventy per cent of the work is contract work where people buy their own land and want a house built.Some work is also done for{North Kesteven {District Council}e.g. school maintenance etc. They have a large variety of equipment including J.C.B. diggers,vans and workshop tools. Most of the supplies are got from Turnbull's and Pattinson's builders merchants at Sleaford with whom the firm has done business since it first started.Mr. Harrod has fifteen men working for him and he stores all his supplies in the yard in Main Street, North Kyme.
